jobs: FixViolation: Add missing test entries AUTH-RP-03 (reset password form submission and verification) and AUTH-CE-02 (successful email confirmation flow) to docs/tests.md, and strengthen existing auth test assertions to verify text content (AUTH-RP-02 error message, AUTH-CE-01 error message, AUTH-FP-02 success message) and data display (AUTH-USR-03 clients page content)
RunTests: Verify tests pass after auth test coverage improvements

FixViolation: Add missing data-testid attributes to auth buttons (ResetPasswordPage Go to app, ConfirmEmailPage Go to app, Sidebar Cancel) and update test entries AUTH-RP-02, AUTH-CE-01, AUTH-FP-01, AUTH-FP-02 with explicit navigation targets and data-testids for all clickable elements
RunTests: Verify tests pass after auth data-testid and navigation target fixes
